headline: Charter to Hold Webcast to Discuss First Quarter 2025 Financial and Operating Results
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHTR) (the "Company" or "Charter") will host a webcast on Friday, April 25, 2025 at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time (ET) to discuss financial and operating results for the quarter ended March 31, 2025. A press release reporting such results will be issued at 7:00 a.m. ET on April 25.
